name: PBY 3D Seaplane Combat in WWII
description:
This is a realisitic simulation of two of the most famous WWII combat seaplanes, the PBY Catalina and the A6M2N Rufe. This is not a casual action game with fancy graphics and eye candy, but an authentic, detailed simulation that will appeal to hard-core flight sim fans.
A custom physics engine provides accurate flight models for all aircraft. Aircraft will stall and spin and weapons will behave realistically.
Play through 8 exciting missions featuring a wide array of gameplay experiences, including search-and-rescue, low-level torpedo attack, anti-submarine missions, air-to-air combat, and much more.
One low price buys you not only the game but all future upgrades for free. Future upgrades will include new planes, new missions and new gameplay such as being able to man the gun positions in the PBY and other aircraft.
Optimized for smooth performance on iPhone 3GS with graphics provided by the Ogre3D engine, this game will provide excellent frame rates and precise control response.
Featuring a unique and innovative control system, that allows users to play the game without having to constantly look at where they are placing their fingers or rotating the screen away from their eyes, this game guarantees ease-of-control and the ability to always maintain visual focus on the action where it belongs.
Welcome to the world of 3D seaplane combat in WWII! Good Hunting.
